sentences.en: " For no life is more insincere than that lived as a masquerade. "
sentences.cn: 因为我的生活将不再像化妆舞会一样虚假.

sentences.en: A: I'll still trying to convince Joseph go to the masquerade party.
sentences.cn: 我还在试着说服约瑟夫去参加化妆舞会.

sentences.en: Everything in the story is possibly something else, a masquerade, a paradox.
sentences.cn: 故事中的每一样东西可能是另外一样东西, 一种假托, 一种前后矛盾的事物.

sentences.en: He might try to masquerade as a policeman.
sentences.cn: 他也许会设法化装成警察.

sentences.en: He told a news conference that the elections would be a masquerade.
sentences.cn: 他在新闻发布会上说选举将是一场骗人的把戏。

sentences.en: He tried to make us act plays and to enter into masquerade.
sentences.cn: 他试着指导我们排演戏剧,还让我们举行化装舞会.

sentences.en: Many also attend the masquerade ball.
sentences.cn: 许多人也会参加化装舞会.

sentences.en: Many operations, however, masquerade as Undo - proof , but they are really easily reversible.
sentences.cn: 然而很多操作伪装成 防 撤销的, 但其实很容易恢复.

sentences.en: Masquerade! Hide your face, so the world will never find you!
sentences.cn: 假面舞会! 隐藏面容, 世界不见!

sentences.en: On chairs were laid elegant masquerade costumes of blue and white satin.
sentences.cn: 椅子上已放着高雅的小丑服装,是用蓝白色的绸缎做的.

sentences.en: One who a mask, especially a participant a masquerade or masque.
sentences.cn: 戴面具的人戴面具的人, 尤指假面舞会参加者.

sentences.en: One who wears a mask , especially a participant in a masquerade masque .
sentences.cn: 他们第一次见面是在一个化装舞会上，两人都穿著很滑稽的服饰。

sentences.en: One who wears a mask , especially a participant in a masquerade or masque.
sentences.cn: 我还在试著说服约瑟夫去参加化妆舞会.

sentences.en: Sometimes a medical illness or another psychiatric condition can masquerade as depression.
sentences.cn: 有时身体疾病或其他精神状况可能表现出抑郁症状.

sentences.en: The masquerade would fail , and besides , masquerade was foreign to his nature.
sentences.cn: 何况跳假面舞也跟他的天性不合,他心里容不下装腔作势.

sentences.en: They were all dressed up to attend the masquerade.
sentences.cn: 他们都盛装去参加那个化装舞会.

sentences.en: This caused issues in a DB2 V7 environment in that to go to another server, you had to "masquerade" as the original node and know their respective passwords.
sentences.cn: 这在 DB2 V7 环境中会导致一些问题，为了恢复到另一台服务器，您必须“伪装”成原先的节点，并且要知道它们各自的密码。

sentences.en: What could a criminal do with a speech synthesis system that could masquerade as a human being?
sentences.cn: 想想看如果罪犯利用完美的语音合成系统伪装成别人会怎么样？

words.tran_cn: 蒙面者；化装舞蹈者；戴假面具的人
冒充者；戴假面具者；参加假面舞会的人
戴面具；掩饰；化装（mask的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: a formal dance or party where people wear  mask s  and unusual clothes
to pretend to be something or someone different
